lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Lakers and their coach, Phil Jackson, were each fined $50,000 by the N.B.A. yesterday after Jackson said the league was conducting a “witch hunt” against Kobe Bryant.
snippet: The Los Angeles Lakers and their coach, Phil Jackson, were each fined $50,000 by the N.B.A. yesterday after Jackson said the league was conducting a “witch hunt” against Kobe Bryant.
